name: Yat-Kha
description: '''Yat-Kha''' is a band from [[Tuva]], led by vocalist/guitarist [[Albert Kuvezin]]. Their music is a mixture of [[Music in the Tuva Republic|Tuvan traditional music]] and [[Rock music|rock]], featuring Kuvezin's distinctive ''[[kargyraa]]'' [[Overtone singing|throat singing]] style, the ''[[kanzat kargyraa]]''.
